Drew McKinney

I’m a product designer (UX/UI) from Boulder, Colorado.

I lead UX Design for Trimble MEP. In the past I’ve worked for VictorOps (now a part of Splunk) and Pivotal as a UX Designer and Project Manager.

Articles

I write about various design and product topics. In the past I wrote for Slack and Pivotal Tracker’s blogs.

  • A UI designer's primer to responsive grids
  • How to measure product retention
  • How to manage design work in Pivotal Tracker

Selected Work

Some of my work has been featured in fancy-pants publications like Life Hacker, Beautiful Pixels, and AppAdvice

Pivotal Tracker Analytics

Tracker is an Agile project management tool for software teams. We created a versitile platform to allow users to understand and act on their project data.

VictorOps Android

VictorOps is an on-call solution and mobile is very important to their business strategy. I led design on the refresh of VictorOps Android app.

VictorOps Onboarding

Getting users comfortable with a new tool is a challenge for any team. At VictorOps, we completely reimagined the way we approached onboarding.
